title: Elastic Path Commerce Cloud Direct to Consumer (D2C) Options Schema
description: Creates a new Elastic Path Commerce Cloud storefront by combining the workspace and application schematics.

directory.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

name.description: The name of the new workspace and project.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the new workspace and initial project?

epccClientId.description: The client id value for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.
epccClientId.x-prompt: What is the client id for your store?

epccClientSecret.description: The client secret value for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.
epccClientSecret.x-prompt: What is the client secret for your store?

epccEndpointUrl.description: The geographical endpoint url for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.
epccEndpointUrl.x-prompt: What is the endpoint for your store?

skipGit.description: Do not initialize a git repository.

skipTests.description: Do not generate "spec.ts" test files for the new project.

plpType.description: The type of product list page to use.
